1987 ) | mark = red _ pog . svg | position = farright | lat = 28 . 99 | long = 77 . 70 }} }} these incidents have been described by [[ gyanendra pandey ( historian ) | gyanendra pandey ]] as a new form of [[ state terrorism ]] , stating that these are not " riots " but " organized political massacres " . {{ sfn | pandey | 2005 | p = 188 }} in 1989 , there were incidents of mass violence throughout the north of india . {{ sfn | chandavarkar | 2009 | p = 29 }}
66 pograms {{ sfn | puniyan | 2003 | pp = 12 – 13 }} one reason given for anti - muslim violence is the ill will , which is still prevalent after the violence during partition . muslims are viewed as suspect and their loyalty to the state is questioned . this tension will at times explode into mass violence against the muslim population . {{ sfn | hefner | 2006 | p = 23 }} according to [[ omar khalidi ]] : < blockquote > anti - muslim violence is planned and executed to render muslims economically and socially crippled and , as a final outcome of that economic and social backwardness , assimilating them into lower rungs of hindu society . {{ sfn | puniyan | 2003 | p = 153 }}
67 pograms = = = cultural nationalism = = = [[ cultural nationalism ]] has also been given as a reason for instances of violence carried out by [[ shiv sena ]] , a [[ fascism | fascist ]] political party . they initially claimed to speak for the people of [[ maharashtra ]] , but their [[ rhetoric ]] quickly turned to inciting violence against muslims . they were complicit in the violence in 1984 in the town of [[ bhiwandi ]] , and again in the violence in [[ mumbai | bombay ]] in 1992 and 1993 . {{ sfn | chandavarkar | 2009 | p = 29 }} in both of these instances , sena had help from the police and local officials . violence has been incited by sena in 1971 and 1986 . {{ sfn |
109 | 2007 }} writer [[ arundhati roy ]] wrote the essay " fascism ' s firm footprint in india " in ' ' the nation ' ' , arguing that the attack had been a " meticulously planned pogrom " . < ref > arundhati roy . 2002 . fascism ’ s firm footprint in india 30 september 2002 . the nation [ http : / / www . xtome . org / docs / countries / india / ar093002 . pdf ] < / ref > several scholars have likewise concluded that the riots must have been pre - planned , and that hindu rioters had been given access to information about the locations of muslim homes and businesses from non - public sources . < ref > chris ogden . a lasting legacy : the bjp - led national democratic alliance and india ' s politics . journal of contemporary asia . vol . 42 , iss . 1 , 2012 < / ref
111 of india | partition ]] {{ sfn | tambiah | 1997 | p = 254 }} a high - ranking member of the special branch , v . deshmukh , gave evidence to the commission tasked with probing the riots . he said the failures in intelligence and prevention had been due to political assurances that the [[ mosque ]] in [[ ayodhya ]] would be protected , that the police were fully aware of the shiv sena ' s capabilities to commit acts of violence , and that they had incited hate against the minority communities . {{ sfn | blom hansen | 2001 | p = 137 }} [[ file : ahmedabad riots1 . jpg | thumb | 250px | < center > the skyline of ahmedabad filled with smoke as buildings and shops are set on fire by rioting mobs < / center > . ]] = = = 2002 gujarat violence = = =
148 > {{ cite book | last = eckhert | first = julia | title = the cultural lives of capital punishment : comparative perspectives | year = 2005 | publisher = stanford university press | isbn = 978 - 0804752343 | page = 215 | editor = austin sarat , christian boulanger }} < / ref > {{ sfn | brass | 2005 | p = 388 }} in 2007 , ' ' [[ tehelka ]] ' ' magazine released " [[ the truth : gujarat 2002 ]] , " a report which implicated the state government in the violence , and claimed that what had been called a spontaneous act of revenge was , in reality , a state - sanctioned pogrom . {{ sfn | risam | 2010 | p = 521 }} according to [[ human rights watch ]] , the violence in gujarat in 2002 was pre - planned , and the police and state government participated in the violence . {{ sfn | narula | 2002 }} in 2012 , modi was cleared of complicity in the violence by a special investigation team appointed by the supreme court . the muslim community is reported to have reacted with " anger and disbelief , " and activist [[ teesta setalvad ]] has said the legal fight was not yet over , as they had the right to appeal . {{ sfn | krishnan | 2012 }} human rights watch has reported on acts of exceptional heroism by hindus , [[ dalit ]] s and tribals , who tried to protect muslims from the violence . {{ sfn | human rights watch | 2003 }}
160 were | 2007 }} ' ' [[ final solution ( 2003 film ) | final solution ]] ' ' by [[ rakesh sharma ]] is considered one of the better [[ documentary film | documentaries ]] which covers the violence in gujarat in 2002 . {{ sfn | gupta | 2013 | p = 372 }} the [[ central board of film certification ]] had tried to [[ censorship in india | ban ]] the film but , in 2004 , chairman [[ anupam kher ]] granted a certificate which allowed an uncut version to be screened . {{ sfn | mazzarella | 2013 | p = 224 }}
161 death in front of their parents , who then met the same fate {{ reflist | 3 }} = = bibliography = = {{ refbegin | 3 }} * {{ cite book | last = blom hansen | first = thomas | title = wages of violence : naming and identity in postcolonial bombay | year = 2001 | publisher = princeton university press | isbn = 978 - 0691088402 | ref = harv }} * {{ cite journal | last = reference | first = blackwell | title = indian communal massacres ( 1946 – 7 ) | journal = blackwell reference | doi = 10 . 1111 / b . 9780631209379 . 1999 . x | ref = {{ sfnref | bihar }} }} * {{ cite book | last = brekke | first = torkel | title = the routledge handbook of religion and security | year = 2012 | publisher = routledge | isbn = 978 - 0415667449 | editor = chris seiple , dennis r . hoover , pauletta otis | ref = harv }} * {{ cite news | last = brass | first = paul | title = the gujarat pogrom of 2002 | url =
162 < ref name = newspaper = social science research council | date = 26 march 2004 | ref = {{ sfnref | brass | 2004 }} }} * {{ cite web | last = brass | first = paul r . | title = on the study of riots , pogroms , and genocide | url =
164 publisher = paul r . brass | ref = {{ sfnref | brass | b }} }} * {{ cite book | last = brass | first = paul r . | title = the production of hindu - muslim violence in contemporary india | year = 2005 | publisher = university of washington press | isbn = 978 - 0295985060 | ref = harv }} * {{ cite book | last = brass | first = paul r . | title = the production of hindu - muslim violence in contemporary india | year = 2003 | publisher = university of washington press | isbn = 978 - 0295985060 | ref = harv }} * {{ cite book | last = berglund | first = henrik | title = religion , politics , and globalization : anthropological approaches | year = 2011 | publisher = berghahn | isbn = 978 - 1845457716 | page = 105 | editor = galina lindquist , don handelman | ref = harv }} * {{ cite book | last = campbell | first = john | title = the routledge handbook of religion and security | year = 2012 | publisher = routledge | isbn = 978 - 0415667449 | editor = chris seiple , dennis hoover , dennis r . hoover , pauletta otis | ref = harv }} * {{ cite news | last = chu | first = henry | title = film on an india pogrom boycotted | url =
612513811 0 these patterns of violence have been well - established since partition , with dozens of studies documenting instances of mass violence against minority groups . {{ sfn | pennington | 2012 | p = 32 }} over 10 , 000 people have been killed in hindu - muslim communal violence since 1950 . {{ sfn | dhattiwala | 2012 | pp = 483 – 516 }} according to official figures , there were 6 , 933 instances of communal violence between 1954 and 1982 and , between 1968 and 1980 , there were 530 hindus and 1 , 598 muslims killed in a total of 3 , 949 instances of mass violence . {{ sfn | brass | 2005 | p = 60 }}
2 according to [[ christophe jaffrelot ]] , a [[ political science | political scientist ]] , organizations with roots in [[ hindu nationalism ]] have played a large part in these incidents of anti - muslim violence , and in generating anti - muslim sentiment . organizations associated with the [[ rashtriya swayamsevak sangh ]] , such as the [[ bharatiya janata party ]] , [[ vishwa hindu parishad ]] and [[ bajrang dal ]] are all considered by scholars {{ who | date = may 2014 }} to have a central role in the violence . the bjp , and its predecessor the [[ jana sangh ]] , have used these communal riots and anti - muslim [[ propaganda ]] as a part of a larger political strategy . {{ sfn | jaffrelot | 2011 | p = 376 }}
612790843 4 nationalists , rather than deal with the claims from the lower class , instead view muslims and christians as not " fully indian " due to their religion , {{ sfn | metcalf | 2006 | p = 89 }} and portraying
615847948 0 [[ wali mohammed wali ]] was first [[ urdu languageurdu ]] [[ ghazal ]] poet . wali ' s tomb in [[ shahibaug ]] locality of [[ ahmedabad ]] was damaged in [[ 2002 gujarat riots ]] and later lost when [[ road roller ]] was run on it and a road was constructed . < ref name = a / > < ref name = b / > however , after protests from citizens and literary class of city , who demanded to re - build the tomb , there are rumors that memorial may be re - built as per orders of [[ gujarat high court ]] . < ref name = a / > however , so far , the [[ government of gujarat ]] has shown no move in this direction . < ref > [ http : / / timesofindia . indiatimes . com / city / ahmedabad / wali - gujaratis - tomb - may - be - rebuilt - following - hc - directions / articleshow / 11830229 . cms ? referral = pm wali gujarati ' s tomb may be rebuilt following hc directions ] < / ref >
617200891 0 < ref > [ http : / / timesofindia . indiatimes . com / city / ahmedabad / wali - gujaratis - tomb - may - be - rebuilt - following - hc - directions / articleshow / 11830229 . cms ? referral = pm wali gujarati ' s tomb may be rebuilt following hc directions ] < / ref >
623708296 0 although illiterates muslims in india generally get into communal violence activities frequently against other common people , there are very rare occurrences of revolts by other communities . religious violence in india has started since the foreign intrusions into india . hindus , jains , sikhs , buddhists lived with tolerance and mutual respect . some leaders with provocative statements trigger the communal violence for their personal benefits . even though other communities believe in mutual respect ,
631182466 0 in anti - muslim riots in india there are three muslims killed for one hindu . < ref > [ http : / / www . sabhlokcity . com / 2014 / 10 / for - every - hindu - killed - in - communal - religious - violence - three - muslims - have - been - killed - in - independent - india - statistics - re - riots / for every hindu killed in communal religious violence , three muslims have been killed in independent india . ( statistics re : riots ) ] < / ref > . the economic competition between hindus and muslims also results in planned riots where muslim businesses are specifically targeted . < ref > [ http : / / www . yale . edu / macmillan / ocvprogram / licep / 3 / wilkinson / wilkinson . pdf religious politics and communal violence : critical issues in indian politics ] < / ref >
634996265 5 [[ cultural nationalism ]] has also been given as a reason for instances of violence carried out by [[ shiv sena ]] , a [[ fascism | fascist ]] political party which initially claimed to speak for the people of [[ maharashtra ]] , but quickly turned their [[ rhetoric ]] to inciting violence against muslims . the shiv sena were complicit in the violence in 1984 in the town of [[ bhiwandi ]] , and again in the violence in [[ mumbai | bombay ]] in 1992 and 1993 . {{ sfn | chandavarkar | 2009 | p = 29 }} in both of these instances , sena had help from the police and local officials . violence has been incited by sena in 1971 and 1986 . {{ sfn | kaur | 2005 | p = 160 }} {{ sfn | chandavarkar | 2009 | p = 114 }} according to [[ sudipta kaviraj ]] the vhp are still engaged in the religious conflicts which began in medieval times . {{ sfn | kaviraj | 2010 | p = 245 }}
6 in [[ 2002 gujarat violence | 2002 ]] , in an incident described as an act of " fascistic state terror , " {{ sfn | singh | 2009 | p = 248 }} hindu [[ extremism | extremists ]] carried out acts of extreme violence against the muslim minority population .
7 government these rapes were condoned by the ruling bjp , {{ sfn | raman | 2009 | p = 210 }} {{ sfn | gangoli | 2007 | p = 42 }} whose refusal to intervene lead to the displacement of 200 , 000 . {{ sfn | shani | 2007 | p = 70 }} death toll figures range from the official estimate of 790 muslims and 254 hindus killed , to 2 , 000 muslims killed . {{ sfn | campbell | 2012 | p = 233 }} chief minister [[ narendra modi ]]
8 in 2007 , ' ' [[ tehelka ]] ' ' magazine released " [[ the truth : gujarat 2002 ]] , " a report which implicated the state government in the violence , and claimed that what had been called a spontaneous act of revenge was , in reality , a state - sanctioned pogrom . {{ sfn | risam | 2010 | p = 521 }} according to [[ human rights watch ]] , the violence in gujarat in 2002 was pre - planned , and the police and state government participated in the violence . {{ sfn | narula | 2002 }} in 2012 , modi was cleared of complicity in the violence by a special investigation team appointed by the supreme court . the muslim community is reported to have reacted with " anger and disbelief , " and activist [[ teesta setalvad ]] has said the legal fight was not yet over , as they had the right to appeal . {{ sfn | krishnan | 2012 }} human rights watch has reported on acts of exceptional heroism by hindus , [[ dalit ]] s and tribals , who tried to protect muslims from the violence . {{ sfn | human rights watch | 2003 }}
9 the film documents atrocities such as families being burned alive in their homes by hindu extremists , women being set on fire after being gang - raped , and children being hacked to pieces . {{ sfn | chu | 2007 }}
640525372 11 . it has been observed in past and in present that muslims usually resort to violence and terrorism once their population crosses 4 % in a given country . europe is a glaring example of this .
12 however , this claim is far from the truth and in a majority of cases , just the opposite . the researchers and social scientists fail to understand that muslims would have been extinct had such anti - islamic campaign would have actually continued . influenced by political correctness and appeasement , they totally neglect the fact that the sole reason muslims remain backward , is because of their unwillingness towards education especially the girl child . moreover , cherry - picking facts to bolster their research in favor of the muslims have further deviated them from the fact that most of the muslim countries have extremely low literacy rate for the same reasons .
641433388 0 there have been periodic instances of ' ' ' violence against muslims in india ' ' ' ( referred to as [[ communal violence | communal riots ]] in india ) since its [[ partition of india | partition from pakistan ]] in 1947 , frequently in the form of mob attacks on [[ muslim ]] s by [[ hindu ]] s that form a pattern of sporadic [[ sectarian violence ]] between the hindu and muslim communities . over 10 , 000 people have been killed in hindu - muslim communal violence since 1950 in 6 , 933 instances of communal violence between 1954 and 1982 . the causes of this [[ violence against muslims ]] are varied . the roots are thought to lie in india ' s history – resentment toward the [[ muslim conquest in the indian subcontinent | islamic domination ]] of india during the [[ middle ages ]] , policies established by the country ' s [[ british raj | british colonizers ]] , and the violent partition of india into a muslim [[ pakistan ]] . many scholars believe that incidents of anti - muslim violence are politically motivated and a part of the electoral strategy of mainstream political parties associated with hindu nationalism . other scholars believe that the violence is not widespread but that it is restricted to certain urban areas because of local socio - political conditions .
641454480 1 = = = 1994 anti - urdu riots = = = on august 15 , 1994 [[ hubli ]] which was reeling communal tensions for some time over the idgah maidan ( a piece of open land held by the anjuman - e - islam ( aei ) , a muslim organization ) . the land was leased out to aei in 1921 bu hubli municipality for religious purposes . two bjp leaders , sikander bakht and uma bharti , joined the flag - hoisting campaign in hubli on the idgah maidan thereby provoking the indignation of the aei . they were arrested and 6 people were killed due to police firing . on october 1994 , hindu - muslim clashes which took place in jagajeevanram nagar in the city of bangalore in india in 1994 . the riots were are believed to be a reaction against telecast of urdu news on the india ' s national television channel , doordarshan at prime - time . the riots resulted in over 25 deaths . < ref name = " bangalore riots " > {{ cite web | url = http : / / www . massviolence . org / hindu - muslim - communal - riots - in , 738 ? artpage = 21 - 30 | title = bangalore riots }} < / ref >

675028334 0 the film has however been termed very one sided by most members of the india intelligentsia , including members of the muslim community . it takes one particualr event during the riots and cashes in on the emotions surrounding it .

675102401 7 = = depictions = = the film ' ' [[ parzania ]] ' ' , which is based on the [[ gulbarg society massacre ]] which occurred during the 2002 violence , was boycotted by [[ movie theater | cinemas ]] in gujarat over fear of sparking another riot . the film documents atrocities such as families being burned alive in their homes by hindu extremists , women being set on fire after being gang - raped , and children being hacked to pieces . {{ sfn | chu | 2007 }} ' ' [[ final solution ( 2003 film ) | final solution ]] ' ' by [[ rakesh sharma ( film maker ) | rakesh sharma ]] is considered one of the better [[ documentary film | documentaries ]] which covers the violence in gujarat in 2002 . {{ sfn | gupta | 2013 | p = 372 }} the [[ central board of film certification ]] had tried to [[ censorship in india | ban ]] the film but , in 2004 , chairman [[ anupam kher ]] granted a certificate which allowed an uncut version to be screened . {{ sfn | mazzarella | 2013 | p = 224 }}
677392683 0 many scholars believe that incidents of anti - muslim violence are politically motivated and a part of the electoral strategy of mainstream political parties who are associated with [[ hindu nationalism ]] like the [[ bharatiya janata party ]] .

710040267 3 . violence against women also included their being stripped naked , sharp objects being pierced into their bodies , acid attacks , beatings , cutting of breasts etc . muslim - owned shops , business centres , buildings and vehicles were destroyed , burnt and looted . coordinated attacks against muslims were carried out by extremist hindu mobs who drove to the sites of violence in large number in trucks . they used swords , petrol bombs , gas cylinders to destroy homes and businesses . children were killed by being burnt alive and speared

714475863 1 | title = terror threat to india rising again six years after mumbai attacks | last = burke | first = jason | date = 2014 - 11 - 25 | newspaper = the guardian | language = en - gb | issn = 0261 - 3077 | access - date = 2016 - 04 - 19 }}
716056199 1 which was not an anti - muslim riot per se but it can be described as the first organised manslaughter between hindus and muslims in india which resulted in death of more than 6000 people . it sparked off several riots between muslims and hindus / sikhs in noakhali
717236715 1 certain incidents like [[ pune techie murder case ]] , [[ 2015 dadri mob lynching ]] and [[ 2016 jharkhand mob lynching ]] can be described as hindu mob attacks on muslim individuals or families due to communal hatred .
717238229 1 which cannot be described as anti - muslim riot per se but as the first organized manslaughter between hindus and muslims in india . it resulted in the death of more than 6000 people and it also sparked off several riots between muslims and hindus / sikhs in noakhali
717241340 1 the riots started as a result of communal tension prevailing in the city after the [[ demolition of babri masjid | babri mosque demolition ]] on 6 december 1992 . the shrikrishna commission identified ' ' ' two phases ' ' ' to the riots . ' ' ' ' ' the first ' ' ' ' ' was mainly a muslim backlash as a result of the babri masjid demolition in the week immediately succeeding 6 december 1992 led by political leaders representing hindutva in the city of [[ ayodhya ]] . ' ' ' ' ' the second phase ' ' ' ' ' was a hindu backlash occurring as a result of the killings of hindu mathadi kamgar ( workers ) by muslim fanatics in dongri ( an area of south bombay ) , stabbing of hindus in muslim majority areas and burning of six hindus , including a physically handicapped girl in radhabai chawl . this phase occurred in january 1993 , with most incidents reported between 6 and 20 january . the report asserted that the communal passions of the hindus were aroused to fever pitch by the inciting writings in print media , particularly saamna and navaakal which gave exaggerated accounts of the mathadi murders and the radhabai chawl incident ; rumours were floated that there were imminent attacks by muslims using sophisticated arms , though the possibility of it happening was very imminent .
717242920 1 post - godhra anti - muslim violence spread like wildfire across gujarat and particularly large cities and towns like ahmedabad , surat , vadodara , rajkot , gandhinagar , halvad , jamnagar , naroda , himatnagar , ode , modasa , bharuch were mostly affected . there were instances of [[ rape in india | rape ]] , children being burned alive , and widespread looting and destruction of property . the chief minister at that time , [[ narendra modi ]] , has been accused of initiating and condoning the violence , as have police and government officials who allegedly directed the rioters and gave lists of muslim - owned properties to them . < ref name = " murphy 2011 " / >
8 . violence against women also included their being stripped naked , sharp objects being forced into their bodies , acid attacks , cutting of breasts , slitting of stomachs and reproductive organs , beatings and then their being killed . it is estimated that at least 250 girls and women had been raped , [[ gang rape ]] d and then burned to death . < ref name = " kabir 2011 " / > children were killed by being burnt alive and those digging mass graves described the bodies as " burned and butchered beyond recognition " . < ref name = " smith 2007 " / > children were force fed petrol and then set on fire , pregnant women were gutted and their unborn child ' s body then shown to the women . in the naroda patiya mass grave of 96 bodies 46 were women . the murderers also flooded homes and electrocuted entire families inside . children and infants were killed by being burnt and speared
717248380 2 it was a three - day period of inter - communal violence in the [[ western india ]] n state of [[ gujarat ]] . following the initial incident there were further outbreaks of violence in [[ ahmedabad ]] for three weeks ; statewide , there were further outbreaks of [[ violence against muslims in india | communal riots ]] against the minority muslim population for three months

739168276 1 }} then chief minister [[ narendra modi ]] has also been accused of initiating and condoning the violence , as have the police and government officials who took part , as they directed the rioters and gave lists of muslim - owned properties to the extremists . {{ sfn | murphy | 2011 | p = 86 }} [[ mallika sarabhai ]] , who had complained over state complicity in the violence , was harassed , intimidated and falsely accused of [[ human trafficking ]] by the bjp . {{ sfn | vickery | 2010 | p = 455 }} three police officers were given punitive transfers by the bjp after they had successfully put down the rioting in their wards , so as not to interfere further in preventing the violence . {{ sfn | eckhert | 2005 | p = 215
739168711 1 }} then chief minister [[ narendra modi ]] has also been accused of initiating and condoning the violence , as have the police and government officials who took part , as they directed the rioters and gave lists of muslim - owned properties to the extremists . {{ sfn | murphy | 2011 | p = 86 }} [[ mallika sarabhai ]] , who had complained over state complicity in the violence , was harassed , intimidated and falsely accused of [[ human trafficking ]] by the bjp . {{ sfn | vickery | 2010 | p = 455 }} three police officers were given punitive transfers by the bjp after they had successfully put down the rioting in their wards , so as not to interfere further in preventing the violence . {{ sfn | eckhert | 2005 | p = 215
739169663 0 . the [[ 1970 bhiwandi riots ]] was an instance of anti - muslim violence which occurred between 7 and 8 may in the indian towns of bhiwandi , jalgaon and mahad . there were large amounts of arson and vandalism of muslim - owned properties .
741426212 1 indian national congress [[ hindu nationalism | hindu nationalist ]] volunteer organisation , [[ rashtriya swayamsevak sangh ]] ( rss ) . in particular , scholars fault the [[ bharatiya janata party ]] ( bjp ) and the [[ shiv sena ]]
2 for example , research by raheel dhattiwala and michael biggs has stated that killings are far higher in areas where the bjp faces stiff electoral opposition than in areas in which it is already strong . {{ sfn | dhattiwala | 2012 | pp = 483 – 516 }} in 1989 , the north of india saw an increase in orchestrated attacks on muslims , and the bjp had further success in the local and state elections . {{ sfn | chandavarkar | 2009 | p = 114 }} the [[ social anthropologist ]] [[ stanley jeyaraja tambiah ]] concludes that the violence in [[ bhagalpur ]] in [[ 1989 bhagalpur violence | 1989 ]] , hashimpura in [[ hashimpura massacre | 1987 ]] and in [[ moradabad ]] [[ 1980 moradabad riots | 1980 ]] were organised killings . {{ sfn | tambiah | 1997 | p = 321 }} according to [[ ram puniyani ]] , the shiv sena were victorious in the elections due to the violence in the 1990s , and the bjp in gujarat after the 2002 violence . {{ sfn | puniyan | 2003 | pp = 12 – 13 }} [[ gyan prakash ]] , however , cautions that the bjp ' s actions in gujarat do not equate to the entirety of india , and it remains to be seen if the [[ hindutva ]] movement has been successful in the deployment of this strategy nationwide . {{ sfn | prakash | 2007 | pp = 177 – 179 }}
750039531 5 7th century [[ partition of india ]] in 1947 , frequently in the form of violent attacks on [[ muslim ]] s by [[ hindu ]] mobs that form a pattern of sporadic [[ sectarian violence ]] between the majority hindu and minority muslim communities
6 over 10 , 000 people have been killed in hindu - muslim communal violence since 1950 in 6 , 933 instances of communal violence between 1954 and 1982 . < ref name = " naʻīm2008 " > {{ cite book | author = ʻabd allāh aḥmad naʻīm | title = islam and the secular state : negotiating the future of shari ` a | url =
11 wordpress the roots are thought to lie in india ' s history & nbsp ; – resentment toward the [[ muslim conquest in the indian subcontinent | islamic domination ]] of india during the [[ middle ages ]] , policies established by the country ' s [[ british raj | british colonizers ]] , and the violent partition of india into an [[ islamic ]] [[ pakistan ]] and a secular india with a muslim minority . many scholars believe that incidents of anti - muslim violence are politically motivated and a part of the electoral strategy of mainstream political parties who are associated with [[ hindu nationalism ]] like the [[ bharatiya janata party ]] . other scholars believe that the violence is not widespread but that it is restricted to certain urban areas because of local socio - political conditions . < ref name = " atal2009 " > {{ cite book | author = yogesh atal | title = sociology and social anthropology in india | url = https : / / books . google
762027452 5 refugees from there . violence was also seen in rural [[ west bengal ]] . < ref > {{ cite web | title = 1964 : riots in calcutta leave more than 100 dead | url = http : / / news . bbc . co . uk / onthisday / hi / dates / stories / january / 13 / newsid _ 4098000 / 4098363 . stm | website = news . bbc . co . uk | publisher = british broadcasting corporation | accessdate = 7 july 2015 }} < / ref > = = = 1983 nellie massacre = = = in the state of [[ assam ]] in 1983 the [[ nellie massacre ]] occurred . nearly 1 , 800
7 constituency village called nellie . {{ sfn | hazarika | 1984 }} {{ sfn | s . b . | 2012 }} it has been described as one of the most severe massacre since [[ world war ii ]] with the majority of victims being women and children , as a result of the actions of the [[ assam movement ]] . {{ sfn | ghosh | 2004 | p = 312 }} {{ sfn | hussain | 2009 | p = 261 }} one reason cited for this incident is that it resulted from a build - up of resentment over immigration . {{ sfn | datta | 2012 | p = 183 }} the assam movement insisted on striking the names of [[ illegal immigration | illegal immigrants ]] from the electoral register and their deportation from the state . there was widespread support for the movement , which tapered off between 1981 and 1982 . {{ sfn | chatterji | 2013 | p = 481 }} the movement demanded that anyone who had entered the state illegally since 1951 be deported . the central government , however , insisted on a cutoff date of 1971 . towards the end of 1982
15 women being set on fire after being gang - raped , and children being hacked to pieces . {{ sfn | chu | 2007 }} ' ' [[ final solution ( 2003 film ) | final solution ]] ' ' by [[ rakesh sharma ( filmmaker ) | rakesh sharma ]] is considered one of the better [[ documentary film | documentaries ]] which covers the violence in gujarat in 2002 . {{ sfn | gupta | 2013 | p = 372 }} the [[ central board of film certification ]] had tried to [[ censorship in india | ban ]] the film but , in 2004 , chairman [[ anupam kher ]] granted a certificate which allowed an uncut version to be screened . {{ sfn | mazzarella | 2013 | p = 224 }}
765226645 0 = = = 1983 nellie massacre = = = in the state of [[ assam ]] in 1983 the [[ nellie massacre ]] occurred . nearly 1 , 800 muslims of bengali origin were slaughtered by lalung tribespeople ( also known as tiwa ) at a village called nellie . {{ sfn | hazarika | 1984 }} {{ sfn | s . b . | 2012 }} it has been described as one of the most severe massacre since [[ world war ii ]] with the majority of victims being women and children , as a result of the actions of the [[ assam movement ]] . {{ sfn | ghosh | 2004 | p = 312 }} {{ sfn | hussain | 2009 | p = 261 }}

817182204 0 = = = 2002 gujarat violence = = = {{ main article | 2002 gujarat violence }} since partition , muslim community has been subject to and engaged in sectarian violence in [[ gujarat ]] . {{ sfn | ghassem - fachandi | 2012 | p = 2 }} in [[ 2002 gujarat violence | 2002 ]] , in an incident described as an act of " fascistic state terror , " {{ sfn | singh | 2010 | p = 348 }} hindu [[ extremism | extremists ]] carried out acts of violence against the muslim minority population , in retaliation to on going sectarian violence and persecution by radicalised islamists , often backed by the pakistan intelligence services , with increasing support amongst the local muslim population .

843583209 0 = = = 2013 muzaffarnagar riots = = = {{ main | 2013 muzaffarnagar riots }} the clashes between the hindu and muslim communities in muzaffarnagar district of uttar pradesh , india in august – september 2013 , resulted in at least 62 deaths including 42 muslims and 20 hindus and injured 93 and left more than 50 , 000 displaced . it was reported on 15 november 2013 that a total of 13 rape and sexual harassment cases were registered over the past two months of rioting and the report named 111 people in the incidents but no arrests had been made till then .
846530918 0 = = why muslims wont leave india = = amenities such as education , subsidy in basic living facilities including a living standard better than most muslim world has caused this . the thankless attitude of muslims combined with their hate and intolerance has fueled anti - social elements within their sect .
849933964 0 = = = gujrat 1969 to 1989 = = = during the [[ 1969 gujarat riots ]] , it is estimated that 630 people lost their lives . {{ sfn | khalidi | 2009 | p = 180 }} the [[ 1970 bhiwandi riots ]] was an instance of anti - muslim violence which occurred between 7 and 8 may in the indian towns of bhiwandi , jalgaon and mahad . there were large amounts of arson and vandalism of muslim - owned properties . in 1980 in moradabad , an estimated 2 , 500 people were killed . the official estimate is 400 and other observers estimate between 1 , 500 and 2 , 000 . local police were directly implicated in planning the violence . {{ sfn | engineer | 1991 | p = 209 }} in 1989 in bhagalpur , it is estimated nearly 1 , 000 people lost their lives in violent attacks , {{ sfn | khalidi | 2009 | p = 180 }} believed to be a result of tensions raised over the [[ ayodhya dispute ]] and the processions carried out by vhp activists , which were to be a show of strength and to serve as a warning to the minority communities . {{ sfn | berglund | 2011 | p = 105 }}
849934118 0 = = = gujrat 1969 to 1989 = = = during the [[ 1969 gujarat riots ]] , it is estimated that 630 people lost their lives . {{ sfn | khalidi | 2009 | p = 180 }} the [[ 1970 bhiwandi riots ]] was an instance of anti - muslim violence which occurred between 7 and 8 may in the indian towns of bhiwandi , jalgaon and mahad . there were large amounts of arson and vandalism of muslim - owned properties . in 1980 in moradabad , an estimated 2 , 500 people were killed . the official estimate is 400 and other observers estimate between 1 , 500 and 2 , 000 . local police were directly implicated in planning the violence . {{ sfn | engineer | 1991 | p = 209 }} in 1989 in bhagalpur , it is estimated nearly 1 , 000 people lost their lives in violent attacks , {{ sfn | khalidi | 2009 | p = 180 }} believed to be a result of tensions raised over the [[ ayodhya dispute ]] and the processions carried out by vhp activists , which were to be a show of strength and to serve as a warning to the minority communities . {{ sfn | berglund | 2011 | p = 105 }} = = = 1964 kolkata = = = riots between [[ hindu ]] s and [[ muslim ]] s had left over a hundred people dead , 438 people were injured . over 7000 people were arrested . 70 , 000 muslims have fled their homes and 55 , 000 were provided protection by the [[ indian army ]] . muslims in kolkata became more ghettoized than ever before in the aftermath of this riot . the riot was believed to be instigated by violence against hindus in [[ east pakistan ]] ( now bangladesh ) and the flow of refugees from there . violence was also seen in rural [[ west bengal ]] . < ref > {{ cite web | title = 1964 : riots in calcutta leave more than 100 dead | url = http : / / news . bbc . co . uk / onthisday / hi / dates / stories / january / 13 / newsid _ 4098000 / 4098363 . stm | website = news . bbc . co . uk | publisher = british broadcasting corporation | accessdate = 7 july 2015 }} < / ref >
